articles.title: Tata Group chairperson Chandrasekaran predicts smaller AI models as the next big thing
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Tata Group chairperson N. Chandrasekaran anticipates significant investments in smaller, domain-focused artificial intelligence (AI) models. He believes smaller models consume less energy, are more cost-effective and deliver faster results than large language models (LLMs).
